dt: {bc}the cessation of operation usually of a jet or rocket engine
{bc}exhaustion of physical or emotional strength or motivation usually as a result of prolonged stress or frustration
{bc}a person showing the effects of drug abuse

shortdef: the cessation of operation usually of a jet or rocket engine; also : the point at which burnout occurs
exhaustion of physical or emotional strength or motivation usually as a result of prolonged stress or frustration

dt: {bc}to drive out or destroy the property of by fire
{bc}to cause to fail, wear out, or become exhausted especially from overwork or overuse

shortdef: to drive out or destroy the property of by fire
to cause to fail, wear out, or become exhausted especially from overwork or overuse
